column5: <srai>FUNCTION FORGET</srai>#NewlineDo you really want me to forget knowledge of prior conversation?
<srai>END FUNCTION</srai>#NewlineAll knowledge of prior conversation has been forgotten.<forget/>
All knowledge of prior conversation has been retained.#Newline<srai>END FUNCTION</srai>
Please respond only with "yes" or "no". Really forget knowledge of prior conversation?#Newline<srai>REPEAT</srai>
